snippet.title: Cyborg3003 - Early Access Trailer - a game made by one person, inspired on Killing Floor game.
snippet.description:
Greetings all. Yes, I really love the game Killing Floor and I as a fan and game developer, found my self on this new challenge, to make a co-op game with a lot of references from the Killing Floor franchise.

That is not my first experience developing games, I made my first game in 2016, a f2p game called Clown2Beat, in 2019 I travelled to GDC to find investor for my project called Shadows of Kepler, so we finished just with a demo, you can play it on Steam.

In 2022 I launched the game called Parallel, a very mysterious and different game. And now here I am, doing a game that I really enjoy... shoot, explosions, action and the best of all for me... a co-op game to play with friends.

You know guys, for me this is a unique experience once again and I hope you enjoy this type of game and can support me so I can continue creating more planets, more weapons and more enemies. Why not a customizable cyborg? Only time will knows.

Thank you very much for any comments, you can find the game here and put it on your wishlist or follow if you wish: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2516430/Cyborg3003/
